英文法規名稱: The Production and Transmission Standards for Cable Radio and Television Advertisements
中文法規名稱: 有線廣播電視廣告製播標準
沿革內容:
1.8 Articles promulgated in full by the order of GIO, Executive Yuan on March 9, 1994. Ref: (83) Chiang-Guang-(1) Tze No. 03761.

These standards shall come into effect as of the date of promulgation. (original name: The production standards for cable television advertisement)

法規內容.條文內容: These standards are promulgated according to Paragraph 2, Article 50 of the Cable Radio and Television Act.

The cable radio and television advertisements in these standards shall refer to the images, sounds and contents transmitted by the system operators to promote commodities, concepts, services, or images.

The contents of the advertisements shall not
1. Violate compulsory or prohibitive regulations under the law;
2. Impair the physical or mental health of children or juveniles; or
3. Disrupt public order or adversely affect good social customs.
The demonstration of the foregoing section is set as an Attached Table.
The cable radio and television enterprises shall transmit certain advertisements in the time slots and with the encoding method designated by the central regulatory agency.
The transmission of advertizing should be distinguishable by subtitles, picture cards, narration, music or other appropriate means from the transmission of programs.
Stipulations for production and transmission of cable radio and television advertisement shall be promulgated by the central regulatory agency.
These standards shall come into effect as of the date of promulgation.
